trans-unit.target: Libraries

trans-unit.source: Libraries built for Python 3 should include depends_on "python", which will bottle against Homebrew’s Python 3.x. Python 2.x libraries must function when they are installed against either the system Python or brewed Python.
trans-unit.target: 为Python 3构建的库应包含 depends_on "python" ，它将与Homebrew的Python 3.x相对立。针对系统Python或Brewed Python安装Python 2.x库时，它们必须起作用。

trans-unit.source: Libraries may be installed to libexec and added to sys.path by writing a .pth file (named like “homebrew-foo.pth”) to the prefix site-packages. This simplifies the ensuing drama if pip is accidentally used to upgrade a Homebrew-installed package and prevents the accumulation of stale .pyc files in Homebrew’s site-packages.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .pth 文件（命名为“ homebrew-foo.pth”）写入 prefix site-packages，可以将库安装到 libexec 并添加到 sys.path 中。如果 pip 意外用于升级安装了Homebrew的程序包，这可以简化后续操作，并防止在Homebrew的站点程序包中积累陈旧的.pyc文件。

If the tap is not installed yet, attempt to install/clone the tap before continuing. To extract a formula from a tap that is not homebrew/core use user/repo/formula.

trans-unit.source: Many Homebrew commands accept one or more formula arguments. These arguments can take several different forms:
trans-unit.target: 许多Homebrew命令接受一个或多个 formula 参数。这些参数可以采用几种不同的形式：

trans-unit.source: Members are expected to remain active within Homebrew, and are required to affirm their continued interest in Homebrew membership annually.
trans-unit.target: 会员应继续活跃在Homebrew内,并需要每年确认他们对Homebrew会员的持续兴趣。

trans-unit.source: Members may be dismissed by majority vote of the Project Leadership Committee and removed from the Homebrew organisation on GitHub. Removed members may be reinstated by the usual admission process.
trans-unit.target: 成员可以被项目领导委员会的多数票驳回,并从GitHub上的Homebrew组织中移除。被除名的成员可以通过通常的接纳程序恢复。

trans-unit.source: Members may cast a vote any time up to three weeks prior to the election date.
trans-unit.target: 成员可在选举日期前三周内的任何时间进行投票。

trans-unit.source: Members may vote in all general elections and resolutions, hold office for Homebrew, and participate in all other membership functions.
trans-unit.target: 会员可以在所有的大选和决议中投票,担任Homebrew的职务,并参加所有其他的会员活动。

trans-unit.source: Members shall vote on any amendments by approving or requesting changes on the GitHub pull request. Voting will close three weeks after an amendment is proposed, and all votes tallied.
trans-unit.target: 成员应通过在GitHub上批准或请求修改来对任何修正案进行投票。投票将在修正案提出三周后结束,并统计所有票数。

trans-unit.source: Members should abstain from voting when they have a conflict of interest not shared by other members. No one may be compelled to abstain from voting.
trans-unit.target: 当成员有与其他成员不同的利益冲突时,应投弃权票。不得强迫任何人投弃权票。

trans-unit.source: New formulae being submitted to Homebrew should run brew audit --new-formula foo. This command is performed by the Brew Test Bot on new submissions as part of the automated build and test process, and highlights more potential issues than the standard audit.
trans-unit.target: 提交给Homebrew的新配方应运行 brew audit --new-formula foo 。此命令由Brew测试机器人对新提交的内容执行，作为自动化构建和测试过程的一部分，并且比标准审核突出了更多潜在问题。

trans-unit.source: New members will be admitted by majority vote of the Project Leadership Committee (PLC) and added to the Homebrew organisation on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 新成员将由项目领导委员会(PLC)以多数票接纳,并加入GitHub上的Homebrew组织。

trans-unit.source: Niche (or self-submitted) stuff
trans-unit.target: 小众(或自荐)的东西。

trans-unit.source: No “$” with environment variables mentioned outside code snippets
trans-unit.target: 在代码段外没有提到带有环境变量的“ $”

trans-unit.source: No “TM”, ™, <sup>SM</sup>, ©, ®, or other explicit indicators of rights ownership or trademarks; we take these as understood when the brand name is mentioned
trans-unit.target: 没有“ TM”，“™”，“ <sup>SM”</sup>，“©”，“®”或其他权利或商标的明确指示；当提及品牌名称时，我们会将其理解为

trans-unit.source: No Oxford commas
trans-unit.target: 无牛津逗号

trans-unit.source: No amendment may be proposed which violates Software Freedom Conservancy policies. The PLC may veto such an amendment by an ordinary resolution.
trans-unit.target: 不得提出违反软件自由保护协会政策的修正案。PLC可通过普通决议否决此类修正案。

trans-unit.source: No configuration is needed in fish. Friendly!
trans-unit.target: fish 不需要任何配置。友好！

trans-unit.source: No more than five versions of a formula (including the non-versioned one) will be supported at any given time, regardless of usage. When removing formulae that violate this we will aim to do so based on usage and support status rather than age.
trans-unit.target: 无论使用情况如何,在任何时候,一个公式(包括非版本的公式)都不会支持超过五个版本。在删除违反这一规定的公式时,我们将根据使用情况和支持状态而不是年龄来删除。

trans-unit.source: No more than two employees of the same employer may serve on the PLC.
trans-unit.target: 同一雇主不得有超过两名雇员担任PLC的成员。

trans-unit.source: No more than two employees of the same employer may serve on the TSC.
trans-unit.target: 同一雇主的雇员不得超过两名。

trans-unit.source: Node for Formula Authors
trans-unit.target: 公式作者节点

trans-unit.source: Node modules should be installed to libexec. This prevents the Node modules from contaminating the global node_modules, which is important so that npm doesn’t try to manage Homebrew-installed Node modules.
trans-unit.target: 节点模块应安装到 libexec 。这样可以防止Node模块污染全局的 node_modules ，这很重要，因此npm不会尝试管理安装了Homebrew的Node模块。

trans-unit.source: Node modules which are compatible with the latest Node version should declare a dependency on the node formula.
trans-unit.target: 与最新节点版本兼容的节点模块应声明对 node 公式的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Not all projects have makefiles that will run in parallel so try to deparallelize by adding these lines to the install method:
trans-unit.target: 并非所有项目都具有可并行运行的makefile，因此请尝试通过将以下行添加到 install 方法来取消并行化：

trans-unit.source: Note on pip install --user
trans-unit.target: 请注意 pip install --user

trans-unit.source: Note that environment variables must have a value set to be detected. For example, export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT=1 rather than just export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，环境变量必须设置为要检测的值。例如， export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT=1 而不是仅 export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT 。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the context of Homebrew, libexec is reserved for private use by the formula and therefore is not symlinked into HOMEBREW_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在Homebrew的上下文中， libexec 保留供公式供私人使用，因此未 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 链接到HOMEBREW_PREFIX。

trans-unit.source: Note that pinned, outdated formulae that another formula depends on need to be upgraded when required as we do not allow formulae to be built against non-latest versions.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当需要时,需要升级另一个公式所依赖的被钉住的过时公式,因为我们不允许针对非最新版本建立公式。

trans-unit.source: Note that this will install some other dependencies like Module::Install. Then put the appropriate incantation in your shell’s startup, e.g. for .bash_profile you insert the below, for others see the local::lib docs.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这将安装一些其他依赖项，例如 Module::Install 。然后在外壳程序的启动中添加适当的标记，例如，对于 .bash_profile ,请插入以下内容，其他代码请参见 local::lib 文档。

trans-unit.source: Note that values can contain unescaped spaces if you use the multiple-argument form of system.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您使用 system 的多参数形式，则值可以包含未转义的空格。

trans-unit.source: Note they are largely untested, and as always, be careful about running untested code on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,它们在很大程度上是未经测试的,和以往一样,在你的机器上运行未经测试的代码时要小心。

trans-unit.source: Note this can also be installed with brew install brew-gem.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这也可以与 brew install brew-gem 一起安装。

trans-unit.source: Note, easy_install is deprecated. We install pip (or pip2 for Python 2) along with python/python2.
trans-unit.target: 注意， easy_install 已过时。我们会同时安装 pip （或 pip2 于Python 2的pip2）以及python / python2。

trans-unit.source: Now (after you restart your shell) cpan or perl -MCPAN -eshell etc. will install modules and binaries in ~/perl5 and the relevant subdirectories will be in your PATH and PERL5LIB etc.
trans-unit.target: 现在（重新启动外壳程序之后）， cpan 或 perl -MCPAN -eshell 等将在 ~/perl5 安装模块和二进制文件，而相关的子目录将位于 PATH 和 PERL5LIB 等中。

trans-unit.source: Now just paste into the formula after __END__. Instead of git diff | pbcopy, for some editors git diff >> path/to/your/formula/foo.rb might help you ensure that the patch is not touched, e.g. white space removal, indentation changes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只需在 __END__ 之后粘贴到公式中即可。代替 git diff | pbcopy ，对于某些编辑者 git diff >> path/to/your/formula/foo.rb 可能会帮助您确保未触及该补丁，例如，空格删除，缩进更改等。

trans-unit.source: Now that homebrew/versions has been deprecated, homebrew/core supports multiple versions of formulae with a new naming format.
trans-unit.target: 既然不建议使用自酿/版本，则自酿/核心支持具有新命名格式的多个版本的公式。

trans-unit.source: Now you just need to push your commit to GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 现在你只需要把你的提交推送到 GitHub 上。

trans-unit.source: OFFICIAL EXTERNAL COMMANDS
trans-unit.target: 官方对外指令

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, these updates require a forced-recompile of the formula itself or its dependents to either ensure formulae continue to function as expected or to close a security issue. This forced-recompile is known as a revision and is inserted underneath the homepage/url/sha256 block.
trans-unit.target: 有时，这些更新需要对公式本身或其依赖项进行强制重新编译，以确保公式继续按预期运行，或解决安全问题。这种强制重新编译称为 revision ，它被插入到 homepage / url / sha256 块下面。

trans-unit.source: Offset nontrivial subordinate clauses with commas
trans-unit.target: 用逗号抵消从属分句

trans-unit.source: On GitHub, your repository must be named homebrew-something in order to use the one-argument form of brew tap. The prefix ‘homebrew-‘ is not optional. (The two-argument form doesn’t have this limitation, but it forces you to give the full URL explicitly.)
trans-unit.target: 在GitHub上，您的存储库必须命名为 homebrew-something ，以便使用 brew tap 参数的单参数形式。前缀“ homebrew-”不是可选的。（两个参数的形式没有此限制，但它会强制您显式提供完整的URL。）

trans-unit.source: On a fresh macOS installation there are three empty directories for add-ons available to all users:

trans-unit.source: Once all feedback has been addressed and if it’s a change we want to include (we include most changes), then we’ll add your commit to Homebrew. Note that the PR status may show up as “Closed” instead of “Merged” because of the way we merge contributions. Don’t worry: you will still get author credit in the actual merged commit.
trans-unit.target: 解决了所有反馈后，如果我们要包含所有更改（我们包含了大多数更改），那么我们会将您的提交添加到Homebrew。请注意，由于我们合并捐款的方式，PR状态可能显示为“已关闭”，而不是“已合并”。不用担心：您仍然会在实际的合并提交中获得作者的荣誉。

trans-unit.source: Once your tap is installed, Homebrew will update it each time a user runs brew update. Outdated formulae will be upgraded when a user runs brew upgrade, like core formulae.
trans-unit.target: 安装水龙头后，每次用户运行 brew update 时，Homebrew都会对其进行更新。用户运行 brew upgrade ，将升级过期的公式，例如核心公式。

trans-unit.source: One formula per commit; one commit per formula.
trans-unit.target: 每项承诺一个公式;每个公式一个承诺。

trans-unit.source: One reason is executables go in /usr/local/bin. Usually this isn’t a writable location. But if you installed Homebrew as we recommend, /usr/local will be writable without sudo. So now you are good to install the development tools you need without risking the use of sudo.
trans-unit.target: 原因之一是可执行文件位于 /usr/local/bin 中。通常这不是可写的位置。但是，如果按照我们的建议安装了Homebrew，则无需sudo即可写入 /usr/local 。因此，现在您可以很好地安装所需的开发工具，而不必冒险使用sudo了。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the URL root used to calculate bottle URLs. By default this is omitted and the Homebrew default bottle URL root is used. This may be useful for taps which wish to provide bottles for their formulae or to cater for a non-default HOMEBREW_CELLAR.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含用于计算瓶子URL的URL根。默认情况下，将省略此名称，并使用Homebrew默认瓶URL根。这对于希望为其配方提供瓶子或迎合非默认 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 的水龙头很有用。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the rebuild version of the bottle. Sometimes bottles may need be updated without bumping the version of the formula, e.g. a new patch was applied. In that case the rebuild will have a value of 1 or more.
trans-unit.target: 可选地包含瓶子的重建版本。有时瓶子可能需要更新而不影响公式的版本,例如应用了一个新的补丁。在这种情况下,重建的值将为1或更多。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the value of HOMEBREW_CELLAR in which the bottles were built. Most compiled software contains references to its compiled location so cannot be simply relocated anywhere on disk. If this value is :any or :any_skip_relocation this means that the bottle can be safely installed in any Cellar as it did not contain any references to its installation Cellar. This can be omitted if a bottle is compiled (as all default Homebrew ones are) for the default HOMEBREW_CELLAR of /usr/local/Cellar.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含在其中构建瓶子的 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 的值。大多数已编译软件都包含对其已编译位置的引用，因此不能简单地将其重新放置在磁盘上的任何位置。如果此值是 :any 或 :any_skip_relocation ,则表示该瓶子可以安全地安装在任何酒窖中，因为它不包含任何对其安装酒窖的引用。如果为 /usr/local/Cellar 的默认 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 编译了一个瓶子（就像所有默认的Homebrew一样），则可以省略该变量。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the value of HOMEBREW_PREFIX in which the bottles were built. See description of cellar. When cellar is :any or :any_skip_relocation the prefix should be omitted.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含在其中构建瓶子的 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 的值。见 cellar 描述。当 cellar 为 :any 或 :any_skip_relocation 时，前缀应省略。

trans-unit.source: Optionally returns a boolean to decide whether a bottle should be used for this formula. For example a bottle may break if another formula has been compiled with non-default options, so this method could check for that case and return false.
trans-unit.target: （可选）返回一个布尔值，以决定是否应将瓶子用于此公式。例如，如果使用非默认选项编译了另一个公式，则瓶子可能会破裂，因此此方法可以检查这种情况并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Options were passed to the install command, i.e. brew install <formula> will use a bottled version of the formula, but brew install --enable-bar <formula> will trigger a source build.
trans-unit.target: 选项已传递给install命令，即 brew install <formula> 将使用该公式的瓶装版本，但是 brew install --enable-bar <formula> 将触发源代码构建。

trans-unit.target: 或一切。

trans-unit.source: Originally Homebrew was a build-from-source package manager and all user environment variables and non-Homebrew-installed software were available to builds. Since then Homebrew added Requirements to specify dependencies on non-Homebrew software (such as those provided by brew cask like X11/XQuartz), the superenv build system to strip out unspecified dependencies, environment filtering to stop the user environment leaking into Homebrew builds and default_formula to specify that a Requirement can be satisfied by a particular formula.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew最初是一个从源代码构建的软件包管理器，并且所有用户环境变量和未安装Homebrew的软件都可以构建。从那时起，Homebrew添加了 Requirement ,以指定对非Homebrew软件的依赖（例如X11 / XQuartz之类的 brew cask superenv 提供的软件），superenv构建系统去除未指定的依赖关系，环境过滤以防止用户环境泄漏到Homebrew构建中，并且 default_formula ,用于指定特定公式可以满足 Requirement 。

trans-unit.source: Other executable scripts
trans-unit.target: 其他可执行脚本

trans-unit.source: Our binary packages (bottles) are built on CircleCI and hosted by Bintray.
trans-unit.target: 我们的二进制包（瓶）是建立在CircleCI和托管Bintray。

trans-unit.source: Our policy is that formulae in the core tap (homebrew/core) must be open-source with an OSI-approved license and either built from source or produce cross-platform binaries (e.g. Java, Mono). Binary-only formulae should go to homebrew/cask.
trans-unit.target: 我们的政策是，核心分接头（homebrew / core）中的公式必须是开放源代码且具有OSI批准的许可证，并且必须由源代码构建或生成跨平台的二进制文件（例如Java，Mono）。仅限二进制的公式应该放在homebrew / cask中。

trans-unit.source: Please note that our preferred commit message format for simple version updates is “<FORMULA_NAME> <NEW_VERSION>”, e.g. “source-highlight 3.1.8” but devel version updates should have the commit message suffixed with (devel), e.g. “nginx 1.9.1 (devel)”. If updating both stable and devel, the format should be a concatenation of these two forms, e.g. “x264 r2699, r2705 (devel)”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于简单版本更新，我们首选的提交消息格式为“ <FORMULA_NAME> <NEW_VERSION> ”，例如“ source-highlight 3.1.8 ”，但 devel 版本更新的提交消息应带有 (devel) 后缀，例如“ nginx 1.9.1 (devel) ”。如果同时更新 stable 和 devel ，则格式应为这两种形式的串联，例如“ x264 r2699, r2705 (devel) ”。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools can be updated via pip, without having to re-brew Python:
trans-unit.target: Setuptools可以通过pip进行更新,而无需重新编译Python。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools provides the easy_install command, which is an end-user package management tool that fetches and installs packages from PyPI, the Python Package Index. pip is another, newer end-user package management tool, which is also provided outside the standard library. While pip supplants easy_install, pip does not replace the other functionality of the setuptools module.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools提供了 easy_install 命令，这是一个最终用户程序包管理工具，可从PyPI（Python程序包索引）获取并安装程序包。 pip 是另一个较新的最终用户包管理工具，它也在标准库之外提供。尽管pip替代了 easy_install ，但pip不会替代setuptools模块的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools requires that SVEM is used in conjunction with --record, which provides a list of files that can later be used to uninstall the package. We don’t need or want this because Homebrew can manage uninstallation but since setuptools demands it we comply. The Homebrew convention is to call the record file “installed.txt”.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools要求SVEM与 --record 结合使用，后者提供了文件列表，这些文件以后可用于卸载软件包。我们不需要或不需要这样做，因为Homebrew可以管理卸载，但是由于setuptools要求我们遵守。自制程序的约定是将记录文件称为“ installed.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Some formulae are marked as “keg-only”, meaning that installed files are not linked to the shared bin, lib, etc. directories, as doing so can cause conflicts. Such formulae can be forced to link to the shared directories, but doing so is not recommended (and will cause brew doctor to complain.)
trans-unit.target: 有些公式标记为“仅插入”，这意味着已安装的文件未链接到共享 bin ， lib 等目录，因为这样做可能会导致冲突。可以强制将这样的公式链接到共享目录，但是不建议这样做（这会导致 brew doctor 抱怨）。

trans-unit.source: Some software installs to man instead of share/man, so check the output and add a "--mandir=#{man}" to the ./configure line if needed.
trans-unit.target: 某些软件是安装到 man 而不是 share/man 的，因此请检查输出，并在需要时在 ./configure 行中添加 "--mandir=#{man}" 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a package fails to build when using a certain compiler. Since recent Xcode versions no longer include a GCC compiler we cannot simply force the use of GCC. Instead, the correct way to declare this is the fails_with DSL method. A properly constructed fails_with block documents the latest compiler build version known to cause compilation to fail, and the cause of the failure. For example:

trans-unit.source: Sometimes formulae have version schemes that change such that a direct comparison between two versions no longer produces the correct result. For example, a project might be version 13 and then decide to become 1.0.0. As 13 is translated to 13.0.0 by our versioning system by default this requires intervention.
trans-unit.target: 有时公式的版本方案会发生变化，以至于两个版本之间的直接比较不再产生正确的结果。例如，一个项目可能是版本 13 ，然后决定成为 1.0.0 。由于默认情况下我们的版本控制系统将 13 转换为 13.0.0 ，因此需要干预。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it’s faster to download a file via means other than those strategies that are available as part of Homebrew. For example, Erlang provides a torrent that’ll let you download at 4–5× the normal HTTP method.
trans-unit.target: 有时，通过Homebrew所提供的那些策略以外的其他方式下载文件会更快。例如，Erlang提供了一个洪流，可让您以普通HTTP方法的4-5倍下载。

trans-unit.source: The Homebrew package manager may be used on Linux and Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL). Homebrew was formerly referred to as Linuxbrew when running on Linux or WSL. It can be installed in your home directory, in which case it does not use sudo. Homebrew does not use any libraries provided by your host system, except glibc and gcc if they are new enough. Homebrew can install its own current versions of glibc and gcc for older distributions of Linux.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew软件包管理器可用于Linux和Linux的Windows子系统（WSL）。在Linux或WSL上运行时，Homebrew以前被称为Linuxbrew。它可以安装在您的主目录中，在这种情况下，它不使用sudo。Homebrew不使用主机系统提供的任何库，但glibc和gcc（如果足够新的话）除外。Homebrew可以为较早的Linux发行版安装自己的当前版本的glibc和gcc。

trans-unit.source: The PLC consists of five members. Committee members are elected by majority vote of Homebrew members. Each PLC member will serve a term of two years or until the member’s successor is elected. Any sudden vacancy in the PLC will be filled by the usual procedure for electing PLC members at the next general meeting, typically the next AGM.
trans-unit.target: PLC由五个成员组成。委员会成员由本土成员的多数票选举产生。每个PLC成员的任期为两年，或者直到选举出其继任者为止。PLC下的任何突然空缺将由在下届股东大会（通常是下届股东周年大会）上选举PLC成员的常规程序来填补。

trans-unit.source: The PLC may meet by any mutually agreeable means, such as text chat, voice or video call, and in person. Members of the PLC must meet at least once per quarter. Members of the PLC must meet by video call or in person at least once per year.
trans-unit.target: 可通过任何双方同意的方式,如短信聊天、语音或视频通话和亲自开会。临委会成员必须每季度至少召开一次会议。巴勒斯坦立法委员会成员必须每年至少通过视频电话或亲自出席一次会议。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will announce candidates and proposals three weeks prior to the election date.
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將於選舉日期前三星期公布候選人及建議。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint between three and five members to the TSC. The Project Leader must be one of these appointees. Appointed TSC members will serve a term of one year or until the member’s successor is appointed.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在TSC中任命三到五个成员。项目负责人必须是这些任命的人之一。任命的TSC成员的任期为一年或直到任命成员的继任者为止。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint the members of the Technical Steering Committee (TSC).
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將委任技術指導委員會的成員。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will deliver a report of their activities, decisions, and financial statements to the Homebrew members at the AGM.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在年度大会上向自酿会员提交活动、决定和财务报表的报告。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will meet annually to review the status of all members and remove inactive members and those who have not affirmed a commitment to Homebrew in the past year. Voting in the AGM confirms that a member wishes to remain active with the project. After the AGM, the PLC will ask the members who did not vote whether they wish to remain active with the project. The PLC removes any members who don’t respond to this second request after three weeks.
trans-unit.target: PLC将每年召开一次会议，审查所有成员的状态，并删除不活跃的成员以及在过去一年中未确认对Homebrew承诺的成员。在年度股东大会上投票确认成员希望继续参与该项目。年度股东大会结束后，PLC将询问未投票的成员是否希望继续参与该项目。PLC将删除三周后未响应第二个请求的所有成员。

trans-unit.source: The Perl module local::lib works similarly to rbenv/RVM (although for modules only, not perl installations). A simple solution that only pollutes your /Library/Perl a little is to install local::lib with sudo:
trans-unit.target: Perl模块的 local::lib 与rbenv / RVM的工作原理类似（尽管仅适用于模块，不适用于perl安装）。一个仅会稍微污染您的 /Library/Perl 的简单解决方案是使用sudo 安装 local::lib ：

trans-unit.source: The Project Leader will be elected annually by a majority vote of Homebrew members. The PLC will nominate at least one candidate for Project Leader. Any member may nominate a candidate, or self-nominate. Nominations must be announced to the membership three weeks before the AGM.
trans-unit.target: 项目负责人将每年由Homebrew成员的多数票选出。PLC将至少提名一名项目负责人的候选人。任何会员都可以提名候选人,或自我提名。提名必须在AGM前三周向会员公布。

trans-unit.source: The Project Leader will represent Homebrew publicly, and manage all day-to-day technical decisions related to the operation of Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: 项目负责人将公开代表Homebrew,并管理所有与Homebrew运营相关的日常技术决策。

trans-unit.source: The Python formulae install pip (as pip or pip2) and Setuptools.
trans-unit.target: Python公式会安装pip（作为 pip 或 pip2 ）和Setuptools。

trans-unit.source: The TSC has the authority to decide on any technical matter, including technical disputes between Homebrew members. The TSC will also decide the long-term roadmap of Homebrew, including large features or major changes to the Homebrew software.
trans-unit.target: TSC有权决定任何技术问题,包括Homebrew成员之间的技术纠纷。TSC还将决定Homebrew的长期发展方向,包括Homebrew软件的大型功能或重大变化。

trans-unit.target: 啤酒表情符号也可以用其他字符代替。

trans-unit.source: The bot automatically builds pull requests and updates their status depending on the result of the job.
trans-unit.target: 机器人会自动建立拉动请求,并根据作业的结果更新其状态。

trans-unit.source: The code is viewable in analytics.rb and analytics.sh. They are done in a separate background process and fail fast to avoid delaying any execution. They will fail immediately and silently if you have no network connection.
trans-unit.target: 该代码可在 analytics.rb 和 analytics.sh 中查看。它们在单独的后台进程中完成，并且快速失败以避免延迟任何执行。如果您没有网络连接，它们将立即安静地失败。

trans-unit.source: The dependencies of libraries must be installed so that they are importable. To minimise the potential for linking conflicts, dependencies should be installed to libexec/<vendor> and added to sys.path by writing a second .pth file (named like “homebrew-foo-dependencies.pth”) to the prefix site-packages.

trans-unit.source: The governance and operation of Homebrew is determined by the PLC. The PLC will represent Homebrew in all dealings with the Software Freedom Conservancy (SFC). The PLC has final authority in all matters related to the operation of Homebrew, and will comply with all Software Freedom Conservancy policies.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的管理和运作由PLC决定。PLC将代表Homebrew与软件自由保护协会(SFC)进行所有交易。PLC拥有所有与Homebrew运营有关的最终权力,并将遵守软件自由保护协会的所有政策。

trans-unit.source: The installation script installs Homebrew to /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew using sudo if possible and in your home directory at ~/.linuxbrew otherwise. Homebrew does not use sudo after installation. Using /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew allows the use of more binary packages (bottles) than installing in your personal home directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话，安装脚本使用sudo将Homebrew安装到 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew ，否则，将其安装在主目录下的 ~/.linuxbrew 。安装后，Homebrew不使用sudo。使用 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 允许使用比在您的个人主目录中安装更多的二进制软件包（瓶）。

trans-unit.source: The only exception is stuff like “Apache Ant”. Apache sticks “Apache” in front of everything, but we use the formula name ant. We only include the prefix in cases like gnuplot (because it’s part of the name) and gnu-go (because everyone calls it “GNU Go”—nobody just calls it “Go”). The word “Go” is too common and there are too many implementations of it.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的例外是诸如“ Apache Ant”之类的东西。Apache将“ Apache”放在所有内容的前面，但是我们使用公式名称 ant 。我们仅在诸如 gnuplot （因为它是名称的一部分）和 gnu-go （因为每个人都将其称为“ GNU Go” —没人将其称为“ Go”）的情况下包括前缀。“ Go”一词太常见了，实现方式太多了。

trans-unit.source: The second level of filtering removes sensitive environment variables (such as credentials like keys, passwords or tokens) to avoid malicious subprocesses obtaining them (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524). This has the effect of preventing any such variables from reaching a formula’s Ruby code as they are filtered before it is called. The specific implementation can be seen in the ENV.clear_sensitive_environment! method.
trans-unit.target: 第二级过滤删除敏感的环境变量（例如凭据，如密钥，密码或令牌），以避免恶意子进程获取它们（https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524）。这样可以防止任何此类变量在调用公式之前就被过滤掉而无法到达公式的Ruby代码。具体的实现可以在 ENV.clear_sensitive_environment! 看到！方法。

trans-unit.source: This script installs Homebrew to /usr/local so that you don’t need sudo when you brew install. It is a careful script; it can be run even if you have stuff installed to /usr/local already. It tells you exactly what it will do before it does it too. You have to confirm everything it will do before it starts.

trans-unit.source: Tons of build scripts break if their dependencies aren’t in either /usr or /usr/local. We fix this for Homebrew formulae (although we don’t always test for it), but you’ll find that many RubyGems and Python setup scripts break which is something outside our control.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们的依赖项不在 /usr 或 /usr/local 中,则大量构建脚本会中断。我们为Homebrew公式修复了此问题（尽管我们并不总是对其进行测试），但是您会发现许多RubyGems和Python安装脚本都中断了，这是我们无法控制的。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: Use brew bump-formula-pr to do everything (i.e. forking, committing, pushing) with a single command. Run brew bump-formula-pr --help to learn more.
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew bump-formula-pr 只需一个命令即可完成所有操作（即分叉，提交，推送）。运行 brew bump-formula-pr --help 了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Use brew info <formula> to check what versions are installed but not currently activated, then brew switch <formula> <version> to activate the desired version. This can be useful if you would like to switch between versions of a formula.
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew info <formula> 来检查已安装但当前未激活的版本，然后使用 brew switch <formula> <version> 来激活所需的版本。如果要在公式的版本之间切换，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: Use brew info and check if the version guessed by Homebrew from the URL is correct. Add an explicit version if not.
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew info 并检查Homebrew从URL猜测的版本是否正确。如果没有，则添加一个显式 version 。

trans-unit.source: Use brew log <formula> to find out! Likely because it had unresolved issues or our analytics identified it was not widely used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew log <formula> 找出答案！可能是因为它有未解决的问题，或者我们的分析表明它没有得到广泛使用。

trans-unit.source: Use brew release-notes --markdown $PREVIOUS_TAG to generate the release notes for the release. Create a new release on GitHub based on the new tag.
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew release-notes --markdown $PREVIOUS_TAG 生成该发行的发行说明。根据新标签在GitHub上创建一个新版本。

trans-unit.source: Use a subordinate list item instead of dropping a multi-sentence paragraph-long item into a list of sentence fragments
trans-unit.target: 使用下级列表项,而不是将一个多句子的段落长项放入句子片段列表中

trans-unit.source: Use the same package manager to manage your macOS, Linux, and Windows systems
trans-unit.target: 使用相同的软件包管理器来管理你的macOS、Linux和Windows系统。

trans-unit.source: Useful, reliable alternatives exist should you wish to use keg_only tools outside of Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望在Homebrew之外使用 keg_only 工具，则可以使用有用的可靠替代方法。

trans-unit.source: Users take precedence over maintainers, except in specifically maintainer-focused documents.

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae in homebrew/core
trans-unit.target: homebrew/core 版本化公式

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should be as similar as possible and sensible compared to the non-versioned formulae. Creating or updating a versioned formula should be a chance to ask questions of the non-versioned formula, e.g. can some unused or useless options be removed or made default?
trans-unit.target: 版本化公式与未版本化公式相比,应尽可能地相似和合理。创建或更新版本化公式应该是对非版本化公式提出问题的机会,例如,是否可以删除一些未使用或无用的选项或将其变成默认选项?

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should differ in major/minor (not patch) versions from the current stable release. This is because patch versions indicate bug or security updates and we want to ensure you apply security updates.
trans-unit.target: 版本化的公式应该与当前稳定版本的主要/次要(不是补丁)版本不同。这是因为补丁版本表示错误或安全更新,我们要确保您应用安全更新。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should not have resources that require security updates. For example, a node@6 formula should not have an npm resource but instead rely on the npm provided by the upstream tarball.
trans-unit.target: 版本化公式不应包含需要安全更新的 resource 。例如， node@6 公式不应具有 npm 资源，而应依赖于上游tarball提供的 npm 。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should only be linkable at the same time as their non-versioned counterpart if the upstream project provides support for it, e.g. using suffixed binaries. If this is not possible, use keg_only :versioned_formula to allow users to have multiple versions installed at once.
trans-unit.target: 如果上游项目提供了支持，例如，使用带后缀的二进制文件，则版本化公式只能与非版本化公式同时链接。如果这不可能，请使用 keg_only :versioned_formula 允许用户一次安装多个版本。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae submitted should be expected to be used by a large number of people. If this ceases to be the case: they will be removed. We will aim not to remove those in the top 3,000 install_on_request formulae.
trans-unit.target: 应该期望提交的版本化公式可以被大量人使用。如果情况不再如此：它们将被删除。我们的目标是不要删除前3,000个 install_on_request 公式中的那些。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae we include in homebrew/core must meet the following standards:
trans-unit.target: 我们在自制软件/内核中包含的版本化公式必须满足以下标准：

trans-unit.source: Versioned software should build on all Homebrew’s supported versions of macOS.
trans-unit.target: 版本软件应基于Homebrew支持的所有macOS版本构建。

trans-unit.source: Versions
trans-unit.target: Versions

trans-unit.source: Vim
trans-unit.target: Vim

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv has a --system-site-packages switch to allow “global” (i.e. Homebrew’s) site-packages to be accessible from within the virtualenv.
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv具有 --system-site-packages 开关，以允许从virtualenv内部访问“全局”（即Homebrew） site-packages 。

trans-unit.source: We aim to bottle everything.
trans-unit.target: 我们的目标是把一切都装进瓶子里。

trans-unit.source: We do not defer to extensive nonstandard capitalisation, typesetting, or other styling of brand names, aside from the normal capitalisation of proper nouns and simple internal capitalisation
trans-unit.target: 除了专有名词的正常大写和简单的内部大写外,我们不会对品牌名称进行大量的非标准大写、排版或其他样式的处理。

trans-unit.source: We don’t accept software without a tagged version because they regularly break due to upstream changes and we can’t provide bottles for them.
trans-unit.target: 我们不接受没有标签版本的软件，因为它们会由于上游更改而定期中断，因此我们无法为其提供包装。

trans-unit.source: We don’t like binary formulae
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢二进制公式

trans-unit.source: We don’t like install scripts that are pulling from the master branch of Git repositories or unversioned, unchecksummed tarballs. These should use resource blocks with specific revisions or checksummed tarballs instead. Note that we now allow tools like cargo, gem and pip to download specifically versioned libraries during installation.
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢从Git存储库的 master 分支中提取的安装脚本或未版本化，未经校验的tarball。这些应该使用具有特定修订版的 resource 块或校验和的tarball。请注意，我们现在允许在安装过程中使用 cargo ， gem 和 pip 之类的工具来下载特定版本的库。

trans-unit.source: We don’t like install scripts that download unversioned things
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢下载未版本化内容的安装脚本

trans-unit.source: We don’t like tools that upgrade themselves
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢自行升级的工具

trans-unit.source: We frown on authors submitting their own work unless it is very popular.
trans-unit.target: 我们不赞成作者提交自己的作品,除非它非常受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: We generally try not to duplicate system libraries and complicated tools in core Homebrew but we do duplicate some commonly used tools.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,我们在核心Homebrew中尽量不重复系统库和复杂的工具,但我们确实重复了一些常用的工具。

trans-unit.source: We may temporarily add versioned formulae for our own needs that do not meet these standards in homebrew/core. The presence of a versioned formula there does not imply it will be maintained indefinitely or that we are willing to accept any more versions that do not meet the requirements above.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能会为满足自己的需要临时添加版本化公式，这些公式不符合Homebrew / core中的这些标准。此处存在版本化公式并不意味着将无限期维护该公式，或者我们愿意接受任何其他不满足上述要求的版本。

trans-unit.source: We now accept stuff that comes with macOS as long as it uses keg_only :provided_by_macos to be keg-only by default.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们接受macOS随附的东西，只要它使用 keg_only :provided_by_macos 默认为仅桶装即可。

trans-unit.source: We now accept versioned formulae as long as they meet the requirements.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只要符合要求，我们就可以接受版本化公式。

trans-unit.source: We prefer:
trans-unit.target: 我们倾向于:

trans-unit.source: We removed SHA1 support in November 2016, 21 months after we started warning people to move away from it for verification. This is enforced in the same way MD5 is, by blocking the installation of that individual formula until the checksum is migrated.
trans-unit.target: 在我们开始警告人们不要使用SHA1进行验证之后的21个月，我们于2016年11月取消了SHA1支持。通过阻止安装单个公式，直到迁移校验和，都以与MD5相同的方式实施。

trans-unit.source: We respect all people’s choice of personal pronouns
trans-unit.target: 我们尊重所有人对人称代词的选择

trans-unit.source: We set up distutils such that pip install will always put modules in $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages and scripts in $(brew --prefix)/share/python. Therefore, you won’t need sudo!
trans-unit.target: 我们将distutils设置为 pip install 始终将模块放在 $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages 中,并将脚本放在 $(brew --prefix)/share/python 中。因此，您不需要sudo！

trans-unit.source: We strive for “correct” but not “fancy” usage. Think newspaper article, not academic paper.
trans-unit.target: 我们力求“正确”使用，而不是“花哨”使用。想想报纸上的文章，而不是学术论文。

trans-unit.source: We use the macOS sandbox to stop this but this doesn’t work when run as the root user (which also has read and write access to almost everything on the system).
trans-unit.target: 我们使用macOS沙箱来阻止此操作，但是以 root 用户身份运行时，此操作将无效（root用户也具有对系统上几乎所有内容的读写访问权限）。

trans-unit.source: We want tests that don’t require any user input and test the basic functionality of the application. For example foo build-foo input.foo is a good test and (despite their widespread use) foo --version and foo --help are bad tests. However, a bad test is better than no test at all.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望不需要任何用户输入的测试，并测试应用程序的基本功能。例如， foo build-foo input.foo 是一个很好的测试，并且（尽管广泛使用） foo --version 和 foo --help 是不好的测试。但是，糟糕的测试总比没有好。

trans-unit.source: We will reject formulae that seem too obscure, partly because they won’t get maintained and partly because we have to draw the line somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 我们将拒绝看起来过于晦涩的公式，部分是因为它们无法得到维护，部分是因为我们不得不在某些地方划清界限。

trans-unit.source: We’re a package manager so we want to do things like resolve dependencies and set up applications for our users. If things require too much manual intervention then they aren’t useful in a package manager.
trans-unit.target: 我们是一个程序包管理器，因此我们想做一些事情，例如解决依赖关系并为我们的用户设置应用程序。如果事情需要太多的手动干预，那么它们在包管理器中就没有用了。

trans-unit.source: Well done, you are now a Homebrew contributor!
trans-unit.target: 做得很好,你现在是家酿贡献者了。

trans-unit.source: What both methods have in common is that they are setting the correct environment for using npm inside Homebrew and are returning the arguments for invoking npm install for their specific use cases. This includes fixing an important edge case with the npm cache (caused by Homebrew’s redirection of HOME during the build and test process) by using our own custom npm_cache inside HOMEBREW_CACHE, which would otherwise result in very long build times and high disk space usage.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法的共同点在于，它们为在Homebrew中使用npm设置了正确的环境，并返回了针对特定用例调用 npm install 的参数。这包括通过在 npm_cache 内使用我们自己的自定义npm_cache来 HOMEBREW_CACHE npm缓存（由Homebrew 在构建和测试过程中对 HOME 进行重定向导致的）的一个重要问题，否则将导致非常长的构建时间和高磁盘空间使用率。

trans-unit.source: When patching (i.e. fixing header file inclusion, fixing compiler warnings, etc.) the first thing to do is check whether or not the upstream project is aware of the issue. If not, file a bug report and/or submit your patch for inclusion. We may sometimes still accept your patch before it was submitted upstream but by getting the ball rolling on fixing the upstream issue you reduce the length of time we have to carry the patch around.
trans-unit.target: 当 patch 荷兰国际集团（即固定头文件包含，修复编译器警告等）做的第一件事就是检查上游项目是否是意识到这个问题。如果不是，请提交错误报告和/或提交补丁以包含在内。有时我们可能仍会在上游提交补丁之前接受您的补丁，但是通过解决上游问题，您可以缩短我们随身携带补丁的时间。

trans-unit.source: When Homebrew already has a formula called foo we typically do not accept requests to replace that formula with something else also named foo. This is to avoid both confusing and surprising users’ expectations.

trans-unit.source: With URL specified, taps a formula repository from anywhere, using any transport protocol that git handles. The one-argument form of tap simplifies but also limits. This two-argument command makes no assumptions, so taps can be cloned from places other than GitHub and using protocols other than HTTPS, e.g., SSH, GIT, HTTP, FTP(S), RSYNC.
trans-unit.target: 在指定了 URL 的情况下，可以使用 git 处理的任何传输协议从任何地方点击公式存储库。一键式 tap 简化但也限制了。这个由两个参数组成的命令不做任何假设，因此可以从GitHub以外的地方克隆水龙头，并使用HTTPS以外的协议（例如SSH，GIT，HTTP，FTP（S），RSYNC）进行克隆。

trans-unit.source: Yes! It’s easy! Just brew create URL. Homebrew will then open the formula in EDITOR so you can edit it, but it probably already installs; try it: brew install <formula>. If you encounter any issues, run the command with the --debug switch like so: brew install --debug <formula>, which drops you into a debugging shell.
trans-unit.target: 是!这很容易！只需 brew create URL 。然后，Homebrew将在 EDITOR 中打开公式，以便您可以对其进行编辑，但它可能已经安装了；试试看： brew install <formula> 。如果遇到任何问题，请使用 --debug 开关运行命令，如下所示： brew install --debug <formula> ，它会将您放入调试外壳。

trans-unit.source: Yes! It’s easy! Just brew edit <formula>. You don’t have to submit modifications back to homebrew/core, just edit the formula as you personally need it and brew install. As a bonus brew update will merge your changes with upstream so you can still keep the formula up-to-date with your personal modifications!
trans-unit.target: 是! 这很容易！只需 brew edit <formula> 。您无需将修改提交回 homebrew/core ，只需根据个人需要编辑公式并进行 brew install 即可。作为额外的 brew update 将您的更改与上游合并，因此您仍然可以通过个人修改使公式保持最新！

trans-unit.source: You should only ever sudo a tool you trust. Of course, you can trust Homebrew 😉 But do you trust the multi-megabyte Makefile that Homebrew runs? Developers often understand C++ far better than they understand make syntax. It’s too high a risk to sudo such stuff. It could modify (or upload) any files on your system. And indeed, we’ve seen some build scripts try to modify /usr even when the prefix was specified as something else entirely.
trans-unit.target: 您只应该使用您信任的工具。当然，您可以信任Homebrew😉但是您是否信任Homebrew运行的数兆字节的Makefile？开发人员通常对C ++的理解远胜于对make语法的理解。sudo这样的东西的风险太大。它可以修改（或上传）系统上的任何文件。确实，我们已经看到一些构建脚本试图修改 /usr ,即使将前缀完全指定为其他名称。
